#README.md

##This README file provide the information about all the attahments for this project.

Following are the files that are attached to this project and description of each of these files is also mentioned here....

1) run_analysis.R - contains the R code for downloading and reading the file and then cleaning up the names and attached the output to another data file.

2) Codebook.html - This contains the code and the steps involved to create the tidier file
3) Codebook.MD - Ths contains the markdown version of the above item #2
4) data_tidy.txt -- This contains the output cleaned up data after processing through the R code.
5) README.Md -- This file
